name: BatchPublisher
title: Google
Cloud
Pubsub
BatchPublisher
description: Topic Batch Publisher object used to publish multiple messages at once.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/pubsub"

pubsub = Google::Cloud::Pubsub.new

topic = pubsub.topic "my-topic"
msgs = topic.publish do |t|
  t.publish "task 1 completed", foo: :bar
  t.publish "task 2 completed", foo: :baz
  t.publish "task 3 completed", foo: :bif
end

methods.name: publish
title: Google
Cloud
Pubsub
BatchPublisher#publish
methods.description: Add a message to the batch to be published to the topic. All messages added to the batch will be published at once. See Google::Cloud::Pubsub::Topic#publish
